p: According to Article 8 of Regulation (EC) No 1831/2003, EFSA, after verifying the particulars and documents submitted by the applicant, shall undertake an assessment in order to determine whether the feed additive complies with the conditions laid down in Article 5. EFSA shall deliver an opinion on the safety for the target animals, consumer, user and the environment and on the efficacy of expressed lemon oil and distilled lemon oil from C. limon (L.) Burm. f. and lime oil from C. aurantiifolia (Christm.) Swingle, when used under the proposed conditions of use (see SectionÂ 3.2.1.2, 3.3.1.2, 3.4.1.2 and 3.5.1.2).
